news.title: VACB refuses to conduct probe against Kerala CM in sand mining case
news.para: VACB declines to investigate petition linked to high court case on corruption charges. Concerns raised about corruption safe channels and legal jurisdictions.

news.title: China may impose record fine on PwC over Evergrande auditing work
news.para: China is set to impose a record fine on PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP and may suspend some of its local operations due to its involvement in a major financial fraud case with China Evergrande Group.

news.title: WeWork cleared to exit bankruptcy and slash $4 billion in debt
news.para: Flexible workspace provider WeWork expanded at breakneck speed but racked up steep losses on its over-extended real estate portfolio before filing for bankruptcy protection in November 2023.

news.title: Awfis Space Solutions shares close with over 9% gains in debut trade
news.para: On the NSE, Awfis Space Solutions shares climbed 9.2 per cent to settle at Rs 415.95 per piece. In volume terms, 1.36 crore equity shares were traded on the NSE.

news.title: ED attaches assets worth over Rs 290 crore of International Amusement
news.para: The Enforcement Directorate has attached properties worth over Rs 290 crore of an amusement and recreation services providing company, including in the popular GIP Mall of Noida, as part of a money laundering investigation.

news.title: EFC (I) posts net profit of Rs 27.93 crore in Q4 FY24
news.para: EFC (I)'s net consolidated total income stood at Rs 99.11 crore in Q4 FY24, a growth of 63.14 per cent from Rs 60.75 crore it recorded in the similar quarter last year.

news.title: Sunteck Realty posts net profit of Rs 101.33 crore in Q4 FY24
news.para: Sunteck Realty's net consolidated total income stood at Rs 434.99 crore in Q4 FY24 as against Rs 56.90 crore it recorded in the similar quarter last year.

news.title: Schneider Electric invests Rs 200 crore on 6.3 lakh sq ft space in Bengaluru
news.para: Deepak Sharma, zone president - Greater India, MD & CEO, Schneider Electric India, said, "It underlines our commitment to expanding our workforce of over 37,000 in India."

news.title: CapitaLand India Trust secures S$200 million sustainability-linked loan from IFC
news.para: This increases CapitaLand India Trust's sustainable finance to S$1.16 billion, which is 79% of its total loans. The SLL will be used to re-finance CLINT’s existing revolving credit facilities (RCFs).

news.title: Emami Realty reports net loss of Rs 70.38 crore in Q4 FY24
news.para: Total income fell to Rs 29.97 crore in the fourth quarter of the last fiscal from Rs 45.61 crore in the corresponding period of the previous year, according to a regulatory filing.

news.title: Chennai development body seals seven shops in Koyambedu market
news.para: The Koyambedu wholesale market is operated by the Market Management Committee which is responsible for overseeing the renewal of shop licences every three years, as mandated by the Tamil Nadu Specified Commodities Markets (Regulation of Location) Act, 1996.

news.title: Nagpur police registers case against three people for cheating buyers of Rs 3.5 crore
news.para: A 47-year-old person, who is into furniture business, entered into an agreement with the builder in 2016 to purchase a shop in the complex for Rs 20 lakh.

news.title: Government tells Gurugram civic body to submit info on C&D waste firm that faced probe
news.para: Moreover, it has sought details of the action taken by MCG against the firm following the inquiry report, which allegedly found that the company had violated the conditions of the tender it was awarded in the past.

news.title: Unregulated PGs create night chaos in Whitefield
news.para: Unauthorised PG accommodations in Bengaluru's Whitefield lead to late-night disturbances. Locals report disruptions from loitering, noisy gatherings, and celebrations. Complaints to BBMP remain unresolved.

news.title: Mhada declares list of 20 dangerous buildings in Mumbai
news.para: The board has appealed to occupants to vacate the buildings and avoid loss of life and property. It has urged them to notify the 24/7 control room at Tardeo of danger or accidents at 022-2353 6945, 022- 2351 7423 and 93216 37699.

news.title: No OC if treated water not used for construction works in Bengaluru: KSPCB
news.para: KSPCB said it will not give ‘no-objection certificate’ — a crucial document for builders and house owners to obtain OC from Bruhat Bengaluru Mahanagara Palike (BBMP) or other urban local bodies — if treated water is not used in construction activities.

news.title: Haryana: No sale or purchase of fourth floor in buildings constructed post 2023 ban
news.para: The house owners are advised to restore all such unauthorized construction to the original position and ensure that no sale/purchase of said units on the 4th floor is undertaken by them.

news.title: Noida authority puts up notices on societies of builders with uncleared dues
news.para: Since Tuesday, notices have been put up in more than 10 condominiums, including Ajnara Daffodils in Sector 137, Antriksh Golf View 2 in Sector 78, Grand Omaxe in Sector 93B and Prateek Wisteria in Sector 77.

news.title: Aadhar Housing Finance posts 43% rise in net profit in Q4 FY24
news.para: Aadhar, a leading lender to the economically weaker section, saw its assets under management grow 23% year-on-year to Rs 21121 crore at the end of March. Its average loan size is Rs 10 lakh.

news.title: Asia Opportunities V, General Atlantic sell 4.46% stake in PNB Housing for Rs 843 crore
news.para: As per the bulk deal data available with the BSE, Asia Opportunities V (Mauritius) and private equity firm General Atlantic Singapore Fund FII Pte sold 58 lakh shares each, amounting to a combined 4.46 per cent stake in PNB Housing Finance.
